item.title: Trump, With Tariffs and Threats, Tries to Strong-Arm Nations to Retreat on Climate Goals
item.description: The president has made no secret of his distaste for wind and solar in America. Now heâ€™s taking his fossil fuel agenda overseas.

item.title: After Blocking U.N. Nuclear Watchdog, Iran Allows Inspectors to Return
item.description: Iran halted cooperation with the agency last month, as experts warned that Tehran might revive efforts to build a nuclear bomb.

item.title: Denmark Apologizes After Involuntary Birth Control Scandal in Greenland
item.description: For years, Danish doctors inserted intrauterine devices in Greenlandic girls and women without their consent, part of a painful legacy of mistreatment...

item.title: Why Ukraine Is Allowing More Young Men to Leave the Country

item.title: Uncovering the Genes That Let Our Ancestors Walk Upright
item.description: A new study reveals some of the crucial molecular steps on the path to bipedalism.
